A modus tollens deduction involving disjunction.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Jul-2009.)

 A modus tollens deduction involving disjunction.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Jul-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mtord.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. ch ) $.
mtord.2 $e |- ( ph -> -. th ) $.
mtord.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ( ch \/ th ) ) ) $.
mtord $p |- ( ph -> -. ps ) $.
